code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{addBusiness,deductBalance}from'../store/slices/business-slice';import'./styles/Business.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Business=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const balance=useSelector(state=>state.business.balance);const businesses=useSelector(state=>state.business.businesses);const handleAddBusiness=business=>{if(balance>=business.price){dispatch(deductBalance(business.price));dispatch(addBusiness(business));}else{alert("Not enough balance to buy this business");}};const businessOptions=[{name:'Soviet Press Kiosk',price:100,profit:10,productionTime:5},{name:'Racketeering',price:500,profit:50,productionTime:15},{name:'Black Market',price:1000,profit:100,productionTime:30},{name:'Video Rental',price:2000,profit:200,productionTime:60}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"business-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Buy a Business"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"business-selection",children:businessOptions.map((business,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddBusiness(business),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/images/".concat(business.name.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g,'-'),".png"),alt:business.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:business.name})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Owned Businesses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:businesses.map((business,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/images/".concat(business.name.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g,'-'),".png"),alt:business.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:business.name})]},index))})]});};export default Business;
